subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Metta World Peace, raised in Queens, could be a free agent by Sunday afternoon. The Knicks have interest, but a homecoming will depend on several unpredictable factors.
snippet: Metta World Peace, raised in Queens, could be a free agent by Sunday afternoon. The Knicks have interest, but a homecoming will depend on several unpredictable factors.
